mapper.select: SELECT o.uuid,o.orderNo,o.creator,o.createTime,o.checker,o.checkTime,o.completer,o.endTime,d.uuid detailUuid,d.orderUuid,d.goodsUuid,d.inPrice, d.supplierUuid,d.num,g.name goodsName,s.name supplierName FROM tbl_purch_order o,tbl_purch_orderdetail d,tbl_goods g,tbl_supplier s WHERE o.uuid = d.orderUuid AND d.goodsUuid = g.uuid AND d.supplierUuid=s.uuid AND o.uuid= #{uuid} ORDER BY o.uuid desc,d.uuid desc
